column6: HARD LESSONS PART 1 When a dangerous young mutant immune to psychic control takes Charles Xavier and the rest of a Manhattan bank hostage, the Professor must lead a diverse group of humans in a risky bid to end the siege.
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
